name: Great 3 Bdr apartment with Airbeds!
neighborhood_overview: It is a diverse neighborhood, multi-cultural.
description:
The apartment has 3 bedrooms with Airbeds with 1 bathroom, kitchen & living room.
Laundry, Dry Cleaners, Food, Market Shops near by.
=> House is 5 - 10 mins walk to train station.
T-Rides: 15 mins to Downtown Boston, 20 minutes to MIT, 25 to MGH, 30 to BIDMC, Dana Farber, Harvard Med School, B & W, 30 to Harvard Square.
=> NOTE: Bus#19 is a 20 minutes ride to Children hospital, Dana Farber,
BIDMC, Harvard Medical School, Brigham & Woman hospital
Bus# 15 to Ruggles T station to NEU.

The space
Very close to the Purple Commuter Line which goes to South Station Boston and the Red Line which goes to Alewife Cambridge.

Guest access
Guests have full access to the apartment.

Other things to note
1) Please state your "Full Name" and the "Purpose of your Stay" when making your inquiry.
2) Area is safe
3) There is also "Free Street Parking" 24 hours, No Resident Permit required.
